topics.title: Describe Your Favorite Flying Experience
topics.prompt: Talk about a time when you felt like flying or traveling fast.
topics.hint: 請用3~5句話描述一次你感覺像在飛翔的經驗，可以是乘坐交通工具或玩耍時的感覺。
topics.sample: Last summer, I went on a roller coaster. It felt like I was flying in the sky. The wind blew on my face and it was very exciting. I want to ride it again soon.

topics.title: How Do You Feel When You Try Something New?
topics.prompt: Describe your feelings when you try a new activity for the first time.
topics.hint: 說3~4句話，分享你第一次嘗試新活動時的心情，可以是害怕、興奮或好奇。
topics.sample: When I tried skateboarding for the first time, I was a little scared because I might fall. But it was also fun and exciting. I wanted to keep practicing.

topics.title: Talk About Your Favorite Fruit
topics.prompt: Describe your favorite fruit and why you like it.
topics.hint: 用3~5句話說明你最喜歡的水果是什麼，味道或特色為何吸引你。
topics.sample: My favorite fruit is watermelon. It is very sweet and juicy, especially on hot days. I like to eat it after playing outside.

topics.title: Tell a Short Story About Jumping or Running
topics.prompt: Create a short story that includes jumping or running.
topics.hint: 用4~6句話講一個簡短故事，可以發生在公園、學校或家裡，有跳躍或奔跑的動作。
topics.sample: One day, I was playing with my friends in the park. We ran and jumped over small rocks. Suddenly, I fell down and hurt my knee. But my friends helped me and we kept playing.

topics.title: Describe How You Use Safety Gear
topics.prompt: Explain why you use safety gear like helmets or pads when you play.
topics.hint: 說明3~4句話為什麼要使用安全護具，可以提到保護身體和避免受傷。
topics.sample: I always wear a helmet and pads when I ride my bike. They protect me if I fall down. It makes me feel safe and I can enjoy riding without worry.

topics.title: Imagine You Have Wings
topics.prompt: Imagine you have wings. Describe what you would do and where you would fly.
topics.hint: 用4~6句話描述你有翅膀時會做什麼，飛到哪裡，感覺如何。
topics.sample: If I had wings, I would fly above the clouds. I would visit different cities and see beautiful places from the sky. Flying would make me feel free and happy.

topics.title: Express What Makes You Feel Wonderful
topics.prompt: Talk about something that made you feel wonderful recently.
topics.hint: 描述3~5句讓你最近感到很棒或開心的事情，可以是有趣的經歷或成功。
topics.sample: Last week, I finished a big school project. My teacher praised me and I felt wonderful. It was a proud moment and I was very happy.

topics.title: Describe a Time You Felt Hurt and How You Coped
topics.prompt: Share a moment when you felt hurt and what you did to feel better.
topics.hint: 請用3~5句話說明你受傷或不舒服的經驗，以及你怎麼處理或恢復。
topics.sample: Once I fell while playing soccer and hurt my leg. It was painful, but I rested and used ice. After a few days, I felt better and could play again.
